**Title:** Organizational Design and Classification Consultant (RFP# ECGZ-RFP-2022-1393)

**Overview:**
Elections Canada is seeking a consultant with expertise in organizational design and classification to support the HR Branch in its organizational adjustments and realignments. The consultant will provide senior-level services to write job descriptions and associated reports/documentation to support the delivery of classification services.

**Requirements:**
- Conduct organizational design and classification services to support the HR Branch
- Develop and write job descriptions and associated reports/documentation
- Provide expertise in organizational design and classification to support the delivery of classification services
- Collaborate with the HR Branch to adjust organizational structures and classifications

**Security Requirements:**
- Minimum corporate security clearance: R2
- Minimum resource security clearance: Reliability status

**Contract Duration:**
- The initial contract period will be 1 year
- The contractor will have the option to extend the contract by 2 additional periods of 12 months each

**Submission and Enquiries:**
- Submissions must be made through the epost Connect service
- Enquiries and other communications must be directed to the Contracting Authority only
- Bidders must submit their proposals in writing to proposal@elections.ca by the deadline indicated in the RFP

**Eligibility:**
- This RFP is open only to Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS

**Canadian Participation:**
- This initiative is, in accordance with its requirements, being implemented under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

- Email: galina.zhukov@elections.ca

- Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 0A9
